title: [Teaser] 이달의소녀탐구 #375.5 (LOONA TV #375.5)
summary: Τeaser for the debut concert and ++ album.\nEveryone is “Hi High” on something and doing weird stuff.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #376 (LOONA TV #376)
summary:
LOONA TV IS BACK YEY!!
0:12 -- HeeJin hikes up a mountain and hasn't hiked in ages. “HOO~~”
0:17 -- She mentions that her hairstyle looks too different and then picks her pig tails. “This hairstyle is way too cute~”
0:33 -- HeeJin's photoshoot.
0:47 -- Another member is making her way up the hill. But, in a car! HeeJin: “Cool~ Ahh~ The Second Member~”
0:57 -- HyunJin: “Hi~ It's a little spoiler”

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #377 (LOONA TV #377)
summary:
0:01 -- The noise from the insect is annoying Kim Lip. She is scared of insects. However, she does her photoshoot, professionally!
0:21 -- The photoshoot ends. “The are lots of bugs and it's too hot.” She wants to see how JinSoul does hers but it is too hot for her.
0:37 -- JinSoul: “Hello~ It's JinSoul~” She points out the stickers and realizes they might not show up too well.
0:48 -- Caps say “Is this real...? (reference to 
)

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #378 (LOONA TV #378)
summary:
0:01 -- JinSoul mentions hwo the concept pof ++ is completly different from OEC.
0:09 -- JinSoul's Cute Pose with a wink and a giggle and Hye watches her from behind.
0:20 -- Hye: “I changed my hairstyle. Do I look young?” (too many references). Yves: “Maybe I'll just maintain this hairstyle.
0:43 -- JinSoul passes the photoshoot baton to Yves. Apparently the three are the tallest and of the same height.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #379 (LOONA TV #379)
members: HaSeul, YeoJin, Choerry, Go Won, Chuu, Kim Lip
summary:
0:02 -- HeeJin: “Hi we are all the tall girls of LOOΠΔ - Hye: “I am the youngest but the tallest. I also have the most potential”
0:17 -- LOONA Up Unit has a shoot first (More subunits!)
0:21 -- Photoshoot conductor: “HyunJin, are you taking a high school graduation photo?”
0:30 -- HyunJin: “OMG so hot. You have to eat Ice Cream when it's hot. You're hot too, aren't you?” as she blows the fan towards the camera.
0:39 -- Kim Lip is losing it with the heat. JinSoul recalls the time they were in a desert for OEC.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #380 (LOONA TV #380)
summary:
0:02 -- HaSeul: “Hello! It's the small girls of LOOΠΔ!” 
0:05 -- LOOΠΔ Line Unit walks towards her (More subunits confirmed!). HaSeul: “Twin tails~” while reffering to Choerry and YeoJin.
0:14 -- Go Won wants to know how she looks and she seems super satisfied. “Everyone here is dressed like a little ghost.
0:22 -- Chuu: “Annyeongggg~~~~” and then calls YeoJin over who put a flower in her hair. YeoJin: “Of course!
0:32 -- Line unit is spinning round and round and that's the concept. Kim Lip: “Cute~ They are quite different with us.”
0:50 -- Line unit's shooting is done. Everyone in the Up unit praise their cuteness.
0:58 -- Yves: “I almost cried because it's been a while since we met” while refferring to Go Won as they are separated by height.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #381 (LOONA TV #381)
summary:
0:07 -- Lippie is making weird noises at the corner. Yves mentions a mouthwash product that's too strong.
0:12 -- Kim Lip: “I'm about to cry...” and then they start shooting a mouthwash commercial.
0:16 -- Yves pours some for Kim Lip and Lippie takes it in in one shot. Yves: “It looks like an alcohol commercial, doesn't it?“
Lippie starts being extra and asks her why it's transparent.
0:40 -- Lip pours some for Yves and Yves actually swallows it as well. Yves: “Mouthwash should be strong like this!”
0:57 -- The two are glad they are adults so they can act like they were drinking. “ADULT!”

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #382 (LOONA TV #382)
summary: 0:01 -- ViVi is on the trampoline. She asks us to guess who's feet and says that they aren't HyunJin's.\n0:17 -- Quick pan to the other members who are jumping as well.\n0:37 -- Yves and Go Won are headed back to the car after the photo shoot while suggesting how they should jump.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #383 (LOONA TV #383)
summary:

0:27 -- HaSeul and Choerry decide to go back in the car as its too warm.
0:33 -- HyunJin has a photoshoot while wearing the white dress.
0:44 -- ViVi kisses HyunJin and :hyunjinwtf:
0:46 -- OEC and yyxy are having snacks together.
0:57 -- Yves: “Put some sound effects” and she proceeds to bite the snack.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #384 (LOONA TV #384)

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #386 (LOONA TV #386)
summary:

0:35 -- “Kim Lip captures the PD camera as well.” JinSoul: “Do it like a real photographer.”
0:43 -- Lippie starts talking about her hair how it looks luxorious. “It is the color of an eclipse” Meanwhile HyunJin pops up in the back. Lip: “I think she wants my hair!” and tries it on.
0:55 -- HyunJin: “I think it looks good. Give it to me!?”

0:55 -- They all do it together now.

0:53 -- Go Won talks about the heat and Go Won smh at 0:55.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #423 (LOONA TV #423)
summary: 0:01 -- HeeJin is alone on the set as she has to film an individual scene. (The one wear she jumps off the bridge.) She doesn't know she has to do it.\n0:26 -- Teleported to the rooftop, we get to see how this part was filmed. A stunt double was hung with a harness and pulled in the air. Heekki appreciates her efforts.\n0:36 -- HeeJin realizes the safety measures but still considers it dangerous. She also knows that this will be the highlight so she has to do her best to connect her running with the jump.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #424 (LOONA TV #424)
summary:
0:01 -- Choerry demonstrates her new 'Water snake dance'.
0:12 -- HyunJin does the dance. Choerry tells ViVi how HyunJin looks like a water snake. Then the three do it together.
0:27 --  Wild froggo appears. YeoJin borrowed a small hat from the clothes teacher and kept it on one of her 'apples'
0:36 -- YeoJin: “Choerry? Does this hat look good on me?” - Choerry: “Uh...” and proceeds to do the water snake dance.
0:44 -- YeoJin: “What is that? It looks ugly.” while refering to the dance. The together upgrade the dance and perform it.
0:51 -- YeoRry are proud of their new dance and end the episode with it.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #425 (LOONA TV #425)
summary:
The Second Day of [++]. OEC arrive in casual clothes.
0:01 -- CHuuHee are watching OEC and Olivia Hye do their part. They start making their own explanations for the scene.
0:07 -- Chuu: “OEC is looking at Olivia like: “Oh my... my Olivia Hye... come over here~” - HeeJin: “No~”
0:12 -- The two hug each other tightly. Meanwhile Yves and Go Won sneak up on them. Hugging each other tighly.
0:20 -- Olivia HeeJin now pretends to be in yyxy. “Olivia Hee”. They keep making more name matches for Olivia. “Olives, Oligo, Oligo-dang”
0:36 -- The shoot still continues. Chuu: “Are they threatening our Olivia Hye? HEY! You better realize that approaching like that could be a threat to someone.”
0:52 -- The four do the Yves swag jump.

title: 이달의소녀탐구 #426 (LOONA TV #426)
summary:
The shoot continues until late night until the MV shoot ends.

0:30 -- “We have a lot of promotional activitues planned so give us your love aand support.”
